short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control volume of individual tabs based on domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom Tab Volume: Control audio levels for individual tabs
Tired of juggling volume between different websites? Custom Tab Volume allows you to set and remember specific volume levels for each domain you visit. Easily adjust audio for video streaming sites, online meetings, or any web application without affecting other tabs. Perfect for multitaskers and audio enthusiasts alike.
Key Features:

Set unique volume levels per domain
Remembers your preferences across sessions
Simple, intuitive interface
Works seamlessly across various websites
Replaces site-specific volume controls for consistent behavior

Important Note:
This extension takes full control of the audio volume for each tab. It overrides and replaces any existing volume controls on websites. This ensures consistent behavior across all sites but means you'll need to use the extension's controls rather than site-specific volume adjusters.
How It Works:

Click the extension icon to set the volume for the current tab
The chosen volume level is remembered for that domain
The extension maintains this volume level, even if the site tries to change it
You can adjust or disable the extension at any time

Take control of your browsing soundscape â€“ one tab at a time! Perfect for sites with autoplay videos, inconsistent volume levels, or lack of built-in volume controls.
Custom Tab Volume: Your solution for a personalized, consistent audio experience across the web.
